model.name: WINEDB
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE FOOD ( r_id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"r_id"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), author string(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"author"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), category string(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"category"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), name string(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"name"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), rating integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"rating"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT food_pkey PRIMARY KEY(r_id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"public"."food"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')

model.name: Services
model.metadata:
CREATE VIEW Retail ( col1 integer NOT NULL ) AS SELECT 19;
CREATE VIEW Food ( r_id integer NOT NULL, author string(255) NOT NULL, category string(255) NOT NULL, name string(255) NOT NULL, rating integer NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT food_pkey PRIMARY KEY(r_id) ) AS SELECT 1, 'RHT', 'SUMMIT', '2017', 99;
